html: wine/strong drink. Symbolic of revelry and seeking the unlawful pleasures of life, the wine here is contrasted to the offer of wine at the Lord's table in 55:1. Anything that dulls the senses also dulls one's commitment to God and his ways (Hosea 4:11), making it more difficult to detect the still, small voice of the Spirit. Those who persist in such a path will be given to drink of a different kind of wine, "the wine of the fierceness of his wrath" (Rev. 16:19).
